alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:18AM CST until February 20 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Locally higher totals to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavy snow rates and patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker
